BackendDrawingInterface
BackendDrawingInterface
BackendDrawingSFML
Functions
DrawEntities
virtual bool DrawEntities(
const std::vector<glm::ivec2>& vertices,
const std::vector<glm::ivec2>& texCoords,
const std::vector<glm::u8vec4>& colours,
const std::vector<int>& counts,
const std::vector<ssGUI::DrawingProperty>& properties
) = 0

Draws the entity based on what is set in the properties. Returns true if drawn successfully. Note that if you are not using ssGUIManager, you need to call Render at the end in order to render it.

Render
virtual void Render(
glm::u8vec3 clearColor
) = 0

Renders every entities that are drawn to the MainWindow. If you are using ssGUIManager, this will be automatically called.
